author: acolytec3
content: just listening to the call now.  My PR (against my own repo - not against main execution-apis repo at present) isn't 100% done but it adds the necessary hacks to allow v2 of the generator to build and imports any markdown

author: acolytec3
content: still have a few improvements to make but it ought to be close to ready to merge

author: boma_naps
content:
Hello, so I did run <@403636673914863626> ’s PR and these are the comparison results. Although the Docusaurus version looks a lot nicer from a UI perspective (just my opinion though), since <@403636673914863626> isn’t completely done with the v2 migration, there’s still some room to tweak it a little bit. Maybe when this PR gets finalized/merged, I can replicate the namespace modification I previously did for Docusaurus to Gatsby.
First image is docusaurus and the second image is gatsby
